post_title: FS:  Centered PSA 4 T206's Starr / Cross / Hallman / Batch
post_content:
Hi all--

Have some nice T206 spares after recent PC upgrades, including a couple of tougher ones.  
All were part of my 520 set for years, which was built with a focus on centering and eye-appeal.
As usual, would love to move these along directly to fellow Net54'ers.


--T206 Charlie Starr, Sweet Caporal 350/25  PSA 4  $225
--T206 Monte Cross, Piedmont 350 PSA 4  $185
--T206 Bill Hallman, Piedmont 350 PSA 4  $195
--T206 Emil Batch, Sweet Caporal 350/30 PSA 4  $185

If you'd like to take the lot at a discounted price, $760 will do it.


Payment is via no-fee PayPal F&F ONLY, and includes shipping to you. Any sale over $250 will ship via USPS 2-Day Priority at my expense.
Please reach out via PM, or direct via email at: [url]bisping@iname.com[/url]
First SOLD reply on the thread gets a given card, and will override any PM's or active discussions.

Enjoy!
